```{r, message = F, warning = F}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, dev.args = list(bg = 'transparent'), eval = T)

library(tidyverse)
library(shiny)

data(chmdat)
data(biodat)
```

```{r}

toplo <- chmdat %>% 
  filter(var %in% 'ara') 

ggplot(toplo, aes(x = date, y = avev)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = minv, ymax = maxv), width = 0) +
  facet_grid(station~.) +
  theme_bw() + 
  theme(
    strip.background = element_blank(), 
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
    ) +
  ylab('Omega')
```
